languages.text: {n}Члены семьи Зауэрбэк во главе с Махарием — все худощавые, строгие и столь похожие друг на друга, кланяются вам почти синхронно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Члены семьи Зауэрбек во главе с Махарием — все худощавые, строгие и столь похожие друг на друга, кланяются вам почти синхронно.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The members of House Sauerback, led by Macharius, all bear a striking resemblance to one another, with their slender builds and stern looks. They bow to you almost in unison.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Члены семьи Зауэрбэк во главе с Махарием — все худощавые, строгие и столь похожие друг на друга, кланяются вам почти синхронно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Sauerback family members, lead by Macharius, who look so similar to each other with their slender builds and stern looks, bow to you almost synchronously.{/n}
{n}The Sauerback family members, lead by Macharius, who look so similar to each other with their slender builds and stern looks, bow to you almost synchronously.{/n}
{n}The Sauerback family members, led by Macharius, who look so similar to each other with their slender builds and stern looks, bow to you almost in unison.{/n}
{n}The Sauerback family members, led by Macharius, who look so similar to each other with their slender builds and stern looks, bow to you almost in unison.{/n}
{n}The members of House Sauerback, led by Macharius, all bear a striking resemblance to one another, with their slender builds and stern looks. They bow to you almost in unison.{/n}
{n}The members of House Sauerback, led by Macharius, all bear a striking resemblance to one another, with their slender builds and stern looks. They bow to you almost in unison.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マハリウスを筆頭とするザウアーバック家の面々は、細身の体格と厳しい表情がよく似通った容姿をしている。彼らは、ほとんど連動するかのように、あなたにお辞儀をする。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The members of House Sauerback, led by Macharius, all bear a striking resemblance to one another, with their slender builds and stern looks. They bow to you almost in unison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスを筆頭とするザウアーバック家の面々は、細身の体格と厳しい表情がよく似通った容姿をしている。彼らは、ほとんど連動するかのように、あなたにお辞儀をする。{/n}

languages.text: {n}在马卡里乌斯的带领下，一众身材修长、神情严肃的苏尔贝克族人几乎同时向你鞠了一躬。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The members of House Sauerback, led by Macharius, all bear a striking resemblance to one another, with their slender builds and stern looks. They bow to you almost in unison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在马卡里乌斯的带领下，一众身材修长、神情严肃的苏尔贝克族人几乎同时向你鞠了一躬。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Agglutinés derrière Macharius, les membres de la famille Sauerback se ressemblent comme autant de gouttes d'eau, avec leurs silhouettes élancées et leur expression taciturne. Ils s'inclinent devant vous à l'unisson.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The members of House Sauerback, led by Macharius, all bear a striking resemblance to one another, with their slender builds and stern looks. They bow to you almost in unison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Agglutinés derrière Macharius, les membres de la famille Sauerback se ressemblent comme autant de gouttes d'eau, avec leurs silhouettes élancées et leur expression taciturne. Ils s'inclinent devant vous à l'unisson.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los miembros de la casa Sauerback, liderados por Macharius, tienen un aspecto muy uniforme: cuerpos enjutos y miradas severas. Te hacen una reverencia, prácticamente al unísono.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The members of House Sauerback, led by Macharius, all bear a striking resemblance to one another, with their slender builds and stern looks. They bow to you almost in unison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los miembros de la casa Sauerback, liderados por Macharius, tienen un aspecto muy uniforme: cuerpos enjutos y miradas severas. Te hacen una reverencia, prácticamente al unísono.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Angehörigen des Hauses Sauerback mit seinem Oberhaupt Macharius, sind allesamt schlank gebaut und sehen sich verblüffend ähnlich. Sie verneigen sich mit ernsten Mienen vor dir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The members of House Sauerback, led by Macharius, all bear a striking resemblance to one another, with their slender builds and stern looks. They bow to you almost in unison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n} Die Mitglieder der Familie Sauerback, angeführt von Macharius, verbeugen sich fast synchron vor dir. Es ist erstaunlich, wie ähnlich sie sich alle sind, mit ihrer schlanken Figur und dem strengen Blick.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius'un önderlik ettiği Sauerback Hanesi mensupları, ince uzun yapıları ve haşin bakışlarıyla birbirlerine son derece benziyor. Hepsi neredeyse mükemmel bir uyumla eğiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The members of House Sauerback, led by Macharius, all bear a striking resemblance to one another, with their slender builds and stern looks. They bow to you almost in unison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius'un önderlik ettiği Sauerback Hanesi'nin mensupları, ince uzun yapıları ve haşin bakışlarıyla birbirlerine son derece benziyorlar. Üyeler, neredeyse mükemmel bir uyumla eğiliyor.{/n}
